attributes.action: Change stamp duty on properties so it increases in a sliding scale rather than jumping at set levels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change stamp duty so when the value of a property hits the duty level its only the amount above that limit that is charged at the higher rate. E.g. a property worth £300,000  would get charged nothing for 0-120,000 1% of 120,000 - 250,000 and 2.5% of 250,000 - 300,000.

This would stop prices bunching around stamp duty levels and allow buyers to more easily put in offers just above stamp duty limits.

I would imagine stamp duty percentages would need to increase in order to keep duty raised for a property about the same value as today.
